metadata.title: Bitcoin ETFs See Third-Largest Weekly Outflow at $1.2B Despite Friday Rebound
metadata.description: Spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds recorded one of their toughest weeks on record, losing nearly $1.2 billion in assets, the third-largest weekly outflow since the products launched 22 months ago. Key Takeaways: Bitcoin ETFs saw nearly $1.2 billion in weekly outflows, marking their third-largest withdrawal event since launch. Despite a steep ...
